pages.title: Salmoran
pages.text: $(l)$(#990000)Health: 30$(#336600)$(br)Armor: 4$(#660066)$(br)Attack: 5$()$(br)Salmoran is a flying mob that is often found in the Dead Valley biome.They do not tolerate strangers in their home, so when they see you, even from afar, they will try to get closer and hit with their strong tail with a poisonous spike at the end. Scales and meat that can be cooked can be derived from them.

pages.title: Suppression
pages.text: If they manage to hit you, then you will, among other things, be subjected to a new negative effect named Suppression, which will not allow you to regenerate your health. Level 5 effect completely blocks regeneration.

Players can tame them with the Salmoran Treat. But you should be careful, because wild Salmorans will still try to attack you. The chance of taming is 20%, otherwise you will be able to make the next attempt only after a while. Attacked Salmorans will also become angry at the player and taming will be impossible for some time. The health level of tamed Salmorans can be increased by using wilthum fruit.

pages.title: Baby Salmoran
pages.text: $(l)$(#990000)Health: 10$(#336600)$(br)Armor: 1$(#660066)$(br)Attack: 2$()$(br)After hatching from the egg, small salmorans still cannot use their wings, and move by crawling on the ground. If you were close enough at the time of hatching, baby salmonorans will be tamed by you, otherwise, they just won't be hostile towards you. But if you hit them, they will start attacking you, moving by jumping. When turning into an adult, small salmorans leaves behind scales, which is an ingredient for crafting new armor.

pages.title: Alpha Salmoran
pages.text: $(l)$(#990000)Health: 45$(#336600)$(br)Armor: 6$(#660066)$(br)Attack: 7$()$(br)Alpha Salmoran is much larger and stronger than usual. Their powerful blow pierces the shield, dealing significant damage to it. Upon death, they can drop an eye, which is used in crafting a special accessory - Salmoran Crown. A Salmoran you tamed can be turned into an Alpha using the Eye of Salmoran, and will also protect you from other Salmorans.

The crown, when worn, will protect you from Salmorans attacks until you hit them. The Salmorans will consider the player with the crown as one of the leaders, but this will not save them from other alphas. Crown can be rapaired with Salmoran Eye on crafting table.
You can create a comfortable couch where tamed Salmorans will be waiting for you.$(br)It can also be just a nice decoration for your home as it can be dyed like beds.
Sometimes it happens that your salmorans flies too far. Use Helyst Bell to make them follow you.
